Finca Decero Cabernet Sauvignon Remolinos Vineyard 2009
Corkcicle Wine Chiller
List.Description:
Also available in pink.Pink Corkcicle

As seen on Oprah's Favorite Things, the Corkcicle allows you to chill wine from the inside. This wine chiller can be placed inside any wine bottle to make it the correct temperature. Corkcicle keeps chilled whites chilled and cools room-temp reds without ice. No excessively warm or chilled wine. Just the right temperature each time, every time.

Simple to use:

  • Step 1:
    Freeze your Corkcicle. For whites, pour the first chilled glass. For red, pour out a "taste" to make room for Corkcicle.
  • Step 2:
    Insert into the wine bottle to cool room temp reds in 15min or keep whites perfectly chilled for an hour.
  • Step 3:
    To refill glasses, simply pull 75% out of the bottle. Tilt bottle over glass to fill.

Vacu Vin Complete 7 Piece Wine Gift Set
List.Description:
This Vacu Vin wine set includes everything a wine lover needs to open, pour, chill, and save wine. Open the wine with the Corkscrew Twister. Simply place the corkscrew on the wine bottle and twist the spiral until the cork is extracted. Pour the wine with the Wine Server Crystals, which allow a perfect, non-drip pour every time. Cool the wine with the Rapid Ice Cooler, which chills wine quickly and keeps it cold. Simply place the Rapid Ice in the freezer until cold, then put it into the Cooler and place wine bottle inside. Lastly, save your wine with the Wine Saver Vacuum Pump and Vacuum Wine Stoppers. The Wine Saver is a vacuum pump, which extracts the air from an opened bottle and re-seals it with a re-usable rubber stopper. Place one of the re-usable Vacuum Wine Stoppers in the bottle and extract the air from the bottle using the Wine Saver pump. A "click" sound tells you when you have reached the optimum vacuum level. The vacuum slows down the oxidation process which makes it possible to enjoy your wine again on a later date.

Git Set Includes:

  • Vacu Vin Corkscrew Twister
  • Vacu Vin Wine Server Crystals (2)
  • Vacu Vin Rapid Ice Wine Cooler with
  • Vacu Vin Wine Saver Vacuum Pump
  • Vacu Vin Vacuum Wine Stoppers (2)

Wine not included.

List.Name: Trentadue La Storia Zinfandel Alexander Valley Estate 2006
Happy Birthday with Tempting Treats Wine Gift Set
List.Description:
A special day deserves a special treat! This medium-bodied Merlot by Parducci has a smooth texture that is the perfect match for cheese, crackers, and chocolates.

Wine Gift Includes:

  • Parducci Merlot:
    This Merlot has complex aromas of sweet black cherries and plums with hints of leafy mint tea. The flavors key on cherries, with a tea-leaf spiciness adding savor and zest.

  • Sonoma Jacks Parmesan Peppercorn Cheese 4 oz
  • Cracked Pepper Flatbread Crackers 2.8 oz
  • Ghirardelli Intense Dark Chocolate Bar 3.5 oz
  • Ghirardelli Prestige Milk Chocolate Caramel Bar 3.5 oz
  • Festive Greet Sheet

Please note that due to the popularity of this product we reserve the right to substitute like wines and vintages of equal or greater value.

Wine gift sets & baskets may be packaged with the bottles separately boxed for their protection during shipment.

Pursuant to state laws in New York, gifts that contain both food and wine will be sent in two separate packages.
